channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
i dont want to spam this section about this so here is my info and private message me plz
(background info) the computer that is with the router and modem is windows xp,downstairs the one i want to have the server on is upstairs connected to its access point and is windows vista. ,i have a WRT54G linksys router, i need to portforward,i go to portforward.com, i click default guide, it says i need static ip,so i click how to set up i go to set it up, it shows 2 dns servers but when i do the steps i only get 1, my ip is 192.168.2.### when it shows the "type static ip here" it has 192.168.1.### i mean wtf am i suposed to do
help me plz!
post if ull help but private message me which ur advice/wisdom/help
edit: i try to do the static ip now and i get:
[code]warnig-multiple gateways are intended to provide redunency to a since network (such as an intranet or the internet) they will notfunction properly when the gatewaysare on two sperate, disjoint networks (such as one on your intranet and your internet) do u want to save this anyway[/code]
THIS IS WAT I PUT [code]
ip address-192.168.2.147 subnet mask-255.255.255.0 default gateway-192.168.2.1
preferred DNS server- 192.168.1.1 alterneate DNS server-(this is the one i cant find)
[/code]

item.title: Port forwarding
item.dc:creator: @poopsicle100 poopsicle100
item.description:
@poopsicle100 wrote:

i dont want to spam this section about this so here is my info and private message me plz

(background info)
the computer that is with the router and modem is windows xp,downstairs the one i want to have the server on is upstairs connected to its access point and is windows vista.
,i have a WRT54G linksys router, i need to portforward,i go to portforward.com, i click default guide, it says i need static ip,so i click how to set up i go to set it up, it shows 2 dns servers but when i do the steps i only get 1, my ip is 192.168.2.### when it shows the “type static ip here” it has 192.168.1.### i mean wtf am i suposed to do

help me plz!

post if ull help but private message me which ur advice/wisdom/help

edit: i try to do the static ip now and i get:

warnig-multiple gateways are intended to provide redunency to a since network (such as an intranet or the internet) they will notfunction properly when the gatewaysare on two sperate, disjoint networks (such as one on your intranet and your internet) do u want to save this anyway

THIS IS WAT I PUT


ip address-192.168.2.147
subnet mask-255.255.255.0
default gateway-192.168.2.1

preferred DNS server- 192.168.1.1
alterneate DNS server-(this is the one i cant find)

Read full topic
